Articles.Content:
I want to know just how fast ksp can handle
 

There are NO restrictions.

Mods are allowed

Cheats are allowed

Kraken exploits are allowed

Proof is needed (Video or image will do)

 

It can be anywhere (Space, atmo, underwater)

 

Even if ksp crashes if you can snatch a picture that will count

 

Keep in mind that this challenge can be quite dangerous to ksp's files (mostly on steam) so i recommend making a copy of ksp in case it deletes itself

also the numbers you will likely get are going to be BIG

 

My best record is this

It was performed via Hyperedit by making the suns gravity 1.73e+280 and placing the craft close to the sun.

Good luck and have fun!

 

*also my first ksp forum post hehe
